verses.text: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall we \w say|strong="G2046"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? Shall we \w continue|strong="G1961"\w* in \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* may \w abound|strong="G4121"\w*?

God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*. \w How|strong="G4459"\w* shall \w we|strong="G2198"\w*, \w that|strong="G3748"\w* are \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* to \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w live|strong="G2198"\w* any \w longer|strong="G2089"\w* \w therein|strong="G0846"\w*?

Know ye \w not|strong="G0050"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* so many of us \w as|strong="G3745"\w* were \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* were \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* we are buried \w with|strong="G4916"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* like \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* was raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, even \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* should \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w newness|strong="G2538"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* we have \w been|strong="G1096"\w* planted \w together|strong="G4854"\w* in the \w likeness|strong="G3667"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, we shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add in the likeness\add* of \add his\add* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*:

\w Knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* is crucified \w with|strong="G4957"\w* \add him\add*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* might be \w destroyed|strong="G2673"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w henceforth|strong="G3371"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w should|strong="G1398"\w* \w not|strong="G3371"\w* \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he that is \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* is \w freed|strong="G1344"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* we be \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, we \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w shall|strong="G4800"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* live \w with|strong="G4800"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* being \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w dieth|strong="G0599"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w*; \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w hath|strong="G2961"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* \w dominion|strong="G2961"\w* over \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* in \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he \w died|strong="G0599"\w*, he \w died|strong="G0599"\w* unto \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w once|strong="G2178"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* in \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*, he \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G3779"\w* \w reckon|strong="G3049"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* unto \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G0936"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mortal|strong="G2349"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, that ye \w should|strong="G1519"\w* \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="G3366"\w* yield \w ye|strong="G3936"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \add as\add* \w instruments|strong="G3696"\w* of \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w* unto \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w yield|strong="G3936"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* those that are \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \add as\add* \w instruments|strong="G3696"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w shall|strong="G2961"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* have dominion \w over|strong="G2961"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? shall we \w sin|strong="G0264"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*? God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*.

Know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w yield|strong="G3936"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w obey|strong="G5218"\w*, his \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w obey|strong="G5219"\w*; \w whether|strong="G2273"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* of \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* be \w thanked|strong="G5485"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w were|strong="G2258"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* ye have \w obeyed|strong="G5219"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* that \w form|strong="G5179"\w* of \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* was delivered \w you|strong="G3860"\w*.

\w Being|strong="G1659"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* made \w free|strong="G1659"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, ye became the \w servants|strong="G1402"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* after the manner of \w men|strong="G0442"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* the \w infirmity|strong="G0769"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* ye have \w yielded|strong="G3936"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* to \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w iniquity|strong="G0458"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0458"\w*; even \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w yield|strong="G3936"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* to \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0038"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* ye \w were|strong="G2258"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, ye \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w* from \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* had \w ye|strong="G2192"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* those things \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w are|strong="G1870"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G1870"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of those \w things|strong="G1565"\w* \add is\add* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* being made \w free|strong="G1659"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* become \w servants|strong="G1402"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0038"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w wages|strong="G3800"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \add is\add* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w gift|strong="G5486"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
